title: Center of mass when objects stick together

content.question: Consider the situation in which the objects collide and stick together. Which of the following predictions is true about the center of mass of the two-object system immediately after the collision?

choices.label: The center of mass does not move.
The velocity of the center of mass does not change.
The velocity of the center of mass decreases in speed.
The velocity of the center of mass increases in speed.

content.answer: The velocity of the center of mass does not change.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
